text: Mortal Kombat vs. DC Universe is an Xbox 360 and PlayStation 3 fighting game released in 2008. It is a crossover video game where Mortal Kombat characters fight DC Comics ones. It has an arcade mode, story mode, and practice. Players can go online with opponents worldwide. title: Mortal Kombat vs. DC Universe
